title: ID this type: Nascar logo
content:
Hi, does anyone know what font this is?

i’m having trouble uploading it, but its at nascar.com.

thanks!

 [‹ staying-alive.org font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306031927/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39546 "Go to previous forum topic") [New York Times Magazine Font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306031927/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39558 "Go to next forum topic")
author: kimsheblue

comments.content:
It looks custom.  
Something like slanted and manually edited Machine [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-machine/medium/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306031927/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-machine/medium/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-machine/medium/")
